title: Pixel 4 Volume control is defaulting to ring tone, not media - How to change it back to media?
content:
My pixel 4 used to control media volume by default when I used the volume control buttons.
Now it's defaulting to the ringer volume and I can't find a way to turn it back.

I've tried rebooting and all of that troubleshoot, but got no luck.
Does anyone experienced the same?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
